DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether nutritional supplementation pregnancy associate 1 ) improve maternal health pregnancy ; 2 ) improve infant birth neurodevelopmental outcome , 3 ) whether association nutritional supplementation pregnancy infant outcomes partially mediate reduction maternal perceive stress stress reactivity pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Maternal Child Health Through Prenatal Fatty Acid Supplementation
DOC.detailed_description: Low-income pregnant woman often experience chronic stress consequently high level stress hormone . In utero exposure high level stress hormone negatively affect develop fetus infant 's capacity emotion behavioral regulation . This program research design reduce negative impact prenatal stress infant health development via nutritional supplementation docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) pregnancy . DHA long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acid member omega-3 fatty acid family . DHA find high concentration neural cell membrane , affect receptor function , neurotransmitter uptake , signal transmission . There grow evidence low level dietary DHA intake associate suboptimal response stress DHA supplementation modulate stress response . One hundred sixty-two pregnant woman randomly assign receive 450 mg/daily DHA placebo begin 9-12 week gestation end pregnancy . Perceived stress , stressful life event , anxiety , depression , inflammatory marker , DHA level response laboratory stressor assess baseline 24 , 30 , 36 week pregnancy . Neonatal outcome ( e.g. , gestational age , birth weight , delivery complication ) collect medical record , infant neurodevelopmental outcome stress reactivity assess 1 , 4 9 month age . Coded data analyze Investigators University Chicago University Pittsburgh
DOC.criteria: Age 18 34 Household recipient public assistance ( e.g . Medicaid insurance ) due low income Low level DHA consumption define less two fish serving per week Reports know medial complication Regular use steroid medication , alcohol , cigarette , illegal substance ( maternal report ) Use blood thinner anticoagulant Use psychotropic medication BMI > 40 Allergy iodine and/or soy
